general.description:
This station was founded by independent spacerithai and -men in the wake of the Fringe Wars, in a system that was called "Althaim", meaning "The crossing" in Irilia. They wanted to built a place where any sentient could come and go freely, to learn the ways of other people and trade any possible goods.
On a major route on the Irilia-Alliance border and near the Gham Garri stronghold at Irilia-4, it has been challenged on several occasions. Each time, spacers all around have assembled in defiance against the threats.
general.bar: A rumbling mass of joyous sentients discussing all matters and occasionnally brawling without any actual anger.
